author: jm
msg: shortcircuiting during compile_now() meant that part of the ruleset went uncompiled until the first message was scanned in each spamd child. fix

author: pamarcelot
msg: Updated Schema Pool. Aliases of Schema Elements are now stored in a lowercase form.
Updated some methods to use the lowercase form before looking for elements.
Added a method for looking for a Schema Element (AT and OC) and another one to verify if a schema element is contained in the pool.
Updated Manage Aliases Dialog to use these new methods.

author: jm
msg: note when rulesets are compiled; helps debugging

author: andreas
msg: FCKEditor: use UUIDs for links and images. This fixes bug 41863. Thanks to Richard Frovarp for the patch.

author: jmsnell
msg: Updating the slug sanitization scheme to be a bit more sane.
